full_text:
MISREPRESENTATION AS A DANGEROUS DRUG.

	No person shall represent, either orally or in writing, or by nonverbal communication, that an over-the-counter drug is a dangerous drug. This section shall be inapplicable to any misrepresentation prohibited by either Section 11355, 11382 or 26460 of the Health and Safety Code of the State of California.

1.catch_line: Over-The-Counter Drugs Resembling Dangerous Drugs – Sale Prohibited.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

MISREPRESENTATION AS A DANGEROUS DRUG. (§ 46.12)

  MISREPRESENTATION AS A DANGEROUS DRUG.	No person shall represent, either
orally or in writing, or by nonverbal communication, that an over-the-counter
drug is a dangerous drug. This section shall be inapplicable to any
misrepresentation prohibited by either Section 11355, 11382 or 26460 of the
Health and Safety Code of the State of California.
